typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{MeterPoint Code} as string,
		{Serial Number} as string,
		{Plant Code} as string,
		{Date/Time} as string,
		{Data Type} as string,
		{Data Value} as string,
		Units as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'dd/MM/yyyy') ~> sink1
